Article.ArticleTitle: Using Genetics To Dissect SARS-CoV-2 Infection.

AbstractText: To uncover the key cellular pathways associated with severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-CoV-2) infectivity, Daniloski and coworkers used CRISPR-based whole-genome screening. Their results could propose new or repositioned drugs for the ongoing fight against COVID-19.
